meanings.definition: A person who hijacks an aircraft in flight.
meanings.sent1: The skyjacker demanded to be taken to a different country.
meanings.sent2: The authorities captured the skyjacker before he could escape.
meanings.sent3: The skyjacker tried to hijack the plane but ended up locked in the cockpit.
meanings.sent4: The skyjacker's plan to take control of the aircraft crashed and burned.
meanings.sent5: Passengers on the plane will never forget the face of the skyjacker.

meanings.definition: To hijack an aircraft in flight.
meanings.sent1: The criminal attempted to skyjacker the plane but was stopped by the pilot.
meanings.sent2: Authorities worked quickly to prevent anyone from trying to skyjacker the aircraft.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot involved a group of friends trying to skyjacker a plane for an adventure.
meanings.sent4: The hacker managed to skyjacker the plane's communication system remotely.
meanings.sent5: The spy's mission was to skyjacker the plane and retrieve the secret documents.
